text: Albert Ndele Bamu (15 August 1930 â€“ 1 April 2023) was a Congolese politician and banker. He was chairman of the College of Commissioners-General. He was later governor of the National Bank of the Congo from 1961 to 1970. He was the Minister of Finance. Ndele died on 1 April 2023, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:2023 deaths Category:1930 births Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo politicians Category:Bankers Category:African businesspeople
title: Albert Ndele
